root.name: Pac-Man VR
root.description: OverviewPac-Man VR is an arcade game released in 1996. It was developed by Virtuality. Players traveled the world in Pac-Man's perspective. Inky, Binky, and Clyde try and stop you. It cost $5 to play.ControlsPlayers turn their heads in order to turn Pac-Man in game. Crouching and walking were used through joystick.
